messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: I am from Broxtowe and I am passionate about our area. I will fight to keep our NHS public. A Brexit that works for everyone. Invest for better homes. Invest in our children's education.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We have a once in a generation opportunity to safeguard the future of our natural environment. I will fight for tougher action on climate change to protect the world we leave behind.
I will fight tirelessly to keep our NHS public with free services for all who need them. It's time to give NHS staff the pay and conditions they deserve.
Too often local planning is driven by profit, not people. The shortage of decent local housing and increasing rent in Broxtowe must be tackled head-on.

issues.brexitEurope: A Brexit that works for everyone
issues.economy: Investing in Broxtowe; ensuring finances work for real people
issues.environment: PROTECTING OUR ENVIRONMENT: We have a once in a generation opportunity to safeguard the future of our natural environment.
issues.health: PROTECTING OUR NHS: I will fight tirelessly to keep our NHS public with free services for all who need them.

community.content: PROTECTING OUR OPEN SPACES: Too often local planning is driven by profit, not people.

leaflet.personalStatement: It’s time for a change. After seven years of Tory austerity, enough is enough. I grew up locally and I’m raising my family here. My record for local jobs and justice speaks for itself. I am proud to stand up for Broxtowe and for local people.

endorsements.endorsement: I have known Greg for 10 years, and he is a man of integrity who cares about people and stands up for what he believes. He will be a fantastic MP for Broxtowe, and I back him all the way.

examples: We have a once in a generation opportunity to safeguard the future of our natural environment.

The shortage of decent local housing and increasing rent in Broxtowe must be tackled head-on.
